definition: Chris Patten (1944-), last British Governor of Hong Kong 1992-1997
surname Peng
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
healthy/peaceful/abundant
surname Kang

sentences.english: European commissioner Chris Patten caught the mood when he suggested yesterday that Israel had dealt with a fire by pouring gasoline on the flames.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟外委會專員彭定康稱，以色列這是往火上澆油。

sentences.english: The whole audience rose as the Chancellor and the Ambassador walked onto the rostrum and took their seats.
sentences.chinese: 全體聽衆起立，彭定康校長和劉大使走上主席臺落座。

sentences.english: Finally the Ambassador quoted Lord Patten of Barnes in his book entitled What Next?
sentences.chinese: 最後，劉大使引用彭定康校長的著書《下步如何？

sentences.english: Chris Patten is the last governor to administer HongKong.
sentences.chinese: 彭定康是管理香港的最後一任總督。

definition: governor of Hong Kong (during the period of British rule, 1841-1997)
